results.title: Short Term, Low Dose Simvastatin Pretreatment Alters Memory Immune Function Following Secondary Staphylococcus aureus Infection.
results.text_hl: Short Term, Low Dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Pretreatment Alters Memory Immune Function Following Secondary @<m>DISEASE_Staphylococcal_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013203 @@@Staphylococcus aureus Infection@@@.

citations.NLM: Smelser LK, Walker C, Burns EM, Curry M, Black N, Metzler JA, McDowell SA, Bruns HA. Short Term, Low Dose Simvastatin Pretreatment Alters Memory Immune Function Following Secondary Staphylococcus aureus Infection. Curr Pharm Biotechnol. 2016;17(10):886-93. PMID: 26927218

results.title: Antibacterial activity of statins: a comparative study of Atorvastatin, Simvastatin, and Rosuvastatin
results.text_hl: A recent study indicated a direct antimicrobial effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and to a lesser extent @CHEMICAL_Fluvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077340 @@@fluvastatin@@@ against MSSA and @<m>DISEASE_Staphylococcal_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013203 @@@MRSA@@@.

citations.NLM: Masadeh M, Mhaidat N, Alzoubi K, Al-Azzam S, Alnasser Z. Antibacterial activity of statins: a comparative study of Atorvastatin, Simvastatin, and Rosuvastatin Ann Clin Microbiol Antimicrob. 2012 May 7;11():13. PMID: 22564676
citations.BibTeX: @article{22564676, title={Antibacterial activity of statins: a comparative study of Atorvastatin, Simvastatin, and Rosuvastatin}, author={Masadeh M and Mhaidat N and Alzoubi K and Al-Azzam S and Alnasser Z}, journal={Ann Clin Microbiol Antimicrob}, volume={11}, pages={13}}
